org.rapla.entities

Interface User

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<User>, Entity<User>, Named, RaplaObject<User>

    public interface User
extends Entity<User>, Named, Comparable<User>
    The User-Class is mainly for authentication-purpose
